entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
